current_state_review.functionality: Stable internal RLNC simulation with multi-threaded encoding.
current_state_review.limitation: Logic is currently trapped in a simulated local environment.

core_intent: To transition from a structural proof-of-concept to a high-performance, real-world network utility focused on resilience and throughput.

strategic_roadmap.title: Congestion & Loss Simulation
strategic_roadmap.objective: Simulate real-world degradation (jitter, latency spikes, and burst loss).

strategic_roadmap.title: Hardware-Aware Concurrency
strategic_roadmap.objective: Dynamic worker scaling based on logical CPU core detection and memory pressure.

strategic_roadmap.title: SIMD / WASM Optimization
strategic_roadmap.objective: Migrate GF(256) math from pure JS to WebAssembly or SIMD instructions.

strategic_roadmap.title: Streaming API Integration
strategic_roadmap.objective: Transition from fixed-block processing to a continuous data stream buffer.

strategic_roadmap.title: Real Networking
strategic_roadmap.objective: Replace simulation with UDP/IP sockets or WebRTC for cross-machine packet exchange.
strategic_roadmap.metric: Packet Recovery Rate over physical links.

strategic_roadmap.title: Advanced Testing & Verification
strategic_roadmap.objective: Implement property-based fuzzing and 10k+ iteration matrix stress tests.
strategic_roadmap.metric: Edge-case Failure Rate / Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF).

strategic_roadmap.title: v6-to-v7 Bridge Review
strategic_roadmap.objective: Formalize the transition from the v6 Post-Mortem into active v7 development branches.
strategic_roadmap.metric: Feature implementation velocity vs v6 baseline.

milestones.phase_1: Stress-test v6 math with the new Advanced Testing suite.
milestones.phase_2: Implement UDP Socket transport in the network layer.
milestones.phase_3: Optimize throughput via threading and WASM.
